info.name: Metropolitan
info.description: TWO DIFFERENT STRUCTURES, THE FORMER IN PLATE STEEL BOTH CHROMED AND VARNISHED, THE LATTER WITH A FOUR STAR BRUSHED ALUMINIUM BASE. MALLEABLE AND EASY TO PLACE ALONGSIDE TABLES THAT DIFFER IN STYLE, IT ALLOWS TO PLAY WITH BASE AND COVER COMBINATIONS: MORE SERIOUS IN LEATHER OR COLOURFUL IN FABRIC.
